channel.title: SFM
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SFM, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Merck shares plunge as company pauses Gardasil vaccine shipments in China, hurting 2025 outlook
item.description: Merck's full-year 2025 revenue guidance fell short of what some analysts were expecting, at a range of $64.1 billion to $65.6 billion.

item.title: Palantir soars 23% to record high as AI powers strong earnings and guidance
item.description: Palantir surged more than 23% on robust fourth-quarter results and guidance.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Ferrari shares pop 8% as luxury carmaker sees further earnings growth in 2025
item.description: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in full-year net profit, citing a strong product mix and growing demand for personal...

item.title: Spotify shares pop 10% after company reports first profitable year
item.description: The music streaming company said it paid a record $10 billion in royalties to the music industry in 2024.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: PayPal shares slip as growth slows in card processing
item.description: PayPal reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and revenue in its quarterly report on Tuesday.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
